CustomField.description: Shows Net Total for Sale and Carry On lines not "bundled" and "bundled"
CustomField.formula: IF( Transaction_Type_Text__c <> "Sale", 0, IF(Shell__c = TRUE, 0, IF(OR(Unit_Text_Text__c = "New Unit", Unit_Text_Text__c = "New Carry On"), 0, IF( NBV_Currency__c <= 0, 0, IF( SBQQ__ProductFamily__c = "Customization", 0, IF(OR (SBQQ__OptionLevel__c <1, Trans_Category__c = "Carry On"), SBQQ__NetTotal__c , SBQQ__RequiredBy__r.Markup_Effective_Percent__c * Total_Cost__c + Total_Cost__c))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Shows Net Total for Sale and Carry On lines not "bundled" and "bundled"
CustomField.label: Effective Net Total
